Will - In Search of A Dream is the inspiring story of determination overcoming losses and succeeding against all obstacles. A young boy, Will (Perry Eggleton), lives in a boarding school after the death of his mother. When Will's father (Damian Lewis, of the TV series - * Homeland *) appears after three years with two tickets to the final of the Champions League in Istanbul, the two are ready for an adventure. Even when Will's father dies unexpectedly, Will is still determined to go to Istanbul as a tribute to his memory. With the participation of Bob Hoskins (Who Framed Roger Rabbit), Will - In Search of A Dream is a thrilling journey over to where someone is going to realize a dream.
